author: treyzania
content: is there fraud proofs for invalid shard execution state transitions?  or have the details on that not been fully sorted out yet?

author: lightclient
content: there is no execution on shards, only data: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/a-rollup-centric-ethereum-roadmap/4698

author: treyzania
content: is there *definietly* never going to be sharded execution?

author: lightclient
content: it's not currently on the roadmap
